CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( breadwinner_qbo__Internal_Status__c ), CASE( breadwinner_qbo__Type__c, 'Purchase Order', breadwinner_qbo__Purchase_Order_Status__c, 'Bill', IF( breadwinner_qbo__Balance_Due__c> 0, IF(breadwinner_qbo__Due_Date__c<TODAY() ,'Overdue','Open/Partial'), 'Paid' ), 'Vendor Credit', IF(breadwinner_qbo__Balance_Due__c > 0, 'Unapplied', 'Closed'), 'Invalid' ), breadwinner_qbo__Internal_Status__c )
CustomField.label: Status
